Reviews.Title: “Decent location but print out booking details”
Reviews.Author: FrequentTravellerEU
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Q Inn during easter 2011 (one year ago), the hotel was pleasant and set in a good location. My partner and I had booked a double bedroom over the internet and upon arrival were given a triple room for one night and told to move rooms the following two nights. We were not warned about this in advance; had I known I would have stayed in another hotel. In addition our room rates promised us free airport transfer on departure, however the hotel refused to acknowledge this. We had to dig in our luggage and show the printout of our booking details to prove that we were entitled to this. This all had a slightly unprofessional feel, but overall the staff were friendly and the rooms comfortable, and the breakfast fine.

Reviews.Title: “Dear friends!”
Reviews.Author: Gulnara V
Reviews.Content: Dear friends! If you find wonderful and non-expensive plase to stay I can give you some good advise - it is here! th1 Q-INN!!! Good food, clean and comfortable rooms, warm and professional staff (especial thank's to mr.Canser)!! Welcome!

Reviews.Title: “Fully recommended”
Reviews.Author: IroPo
Reviews.Content: Friendly and helpful people! Small but clean and central-good price!fully worth it!

Reviews.Title: “nice and clean”
Reviews.Author: marou777
Reviews.Content: I have spent 5 nights in hotel Q-inn Laleli , and I'm really satisfy with my stay ... it is central, near the tramvay station University Laleli, a bus station serving all over Istanbul, the metro station Aksaray and Historia mall are at 1 km, the Grand Bazaar is at about 500 meters (10 minutes of walk). back to the hotel, it is a boutique hotel, unpretentious, charming and very very clean, medium-sized, our room was very clean, beautiful and tastefully decorated, (it could be easily a room of a five star hotel). The restaurant has a beautiful view of the Marmara sea and the port Yenicapi, the breakfast is correct with a variety salty and sweet, The staff is friendly and efficient, my special thanks to Mr Ã§enser the manager. Personnally i recommend this hotel for those seeking a clean, quiet and central.

Reviews.Title: “Small but Elegant”
Reviews.Author: zebramones
Reviews.Content: Location: This hotel is located at Laleli and there are a lot of shops and restaurants near the hotel. I just walked to Grand Bazaar, which is about 1 kilometer away to Grand Bazaar entrance (I think it's entrance of Gate 7). It is also close to the tram station. Room: I love the design and furnishing, which is somewhat like a boutique hotel but the rooms are small. Everything in the room was working so no complaints on this. Breakfast: Limited choices available and the food quality was acceptable by my standard. The restaurant was quite small too but nicely decorated. Suitable for: Young couples, travelling with friends, business and solo travellers. Unsuitable for: Travellers with infants/strollers/wheelchair. Would I stay again in this hotel? Probably, but not with my young children. Would I come again to Istanbul? DEFINITELY OVERALL: As this is my first trip to Istanbul, I think my review of this hotel is very much overshadowed by the beauty and excellence of Istanbul. Probably if this is my third or fourth visit to Istanbul, I wouldn't stay in this hotel because I'm sure I can get a better deal and location elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “A stay to remember...”
Reviews.Author: Adrienne F
Reviews.Content: nice place to stay in.The place of the hotel is very accessible to almost of the nice sight seeing places.clean room,food,staffs and a very good location of the restaurant.definitely i will find ways to come back in there.To all of the staffs,...thumbs up..and to Mr.Canser, thank u very much for making our stay so comfortable and memorable.Hoping to see u all soon...on behalf of my friend and colleague Cristy, thank u very much.God bless and best regards to all.Its me Mary Ann D.F

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rustam A
Reviews.Content: I like it very much. Very friendly and professional personal. Light and clean rooms. Stay there when i visit Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “unfriendly staff, no hot water, overpriced”
Reviews.Author: fromagetraveller
Reviews.Content: Room was clean but small, window looked out on to internal ventilation shaft - so no view. Biggest issue was lack of hot water - it was only tepid, far too cold to shower comfortably, for the whole of my 4 day stay. Presumably an energy/cost saving measure. Staff didn't smile or speak. Significantly overpriced given the above.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back in Q-Inn hotel in Kosaka Cad. ( Laleli )”
Reviews.Author: Pietro A
Reviews.Content: Special congratulation for the Staf ,like Azat, Murat ,Mehmet, Canser and beautiful girl from the reception :)) They are my friends!!! Thank you for everything! and i hope that we'll see it again!:) Pietro and Raly from Rome (Italy) p.s Q-Inn Hotel - Koska Cad.N-30 34130 Laleli -Istanbul - The Best One :))

Reviews.Title: “Huge Disappointment !”
Reviews.Author: --Solid_v_Snake--
Reviews.Content: I've travelled to Turkey for 10 days July 2011 (Antalya & Istanbul) and to be frank,this is one of the worst hotels that i've stayed at in my life. I read the reviews and saw the pics posted here and therefor decided to go for it,but the truth is that this hotel is nothing as the reviews posted here. I frankly dont advice anyone to stay here except if you're on a very tight budget,although this hotel is way overpriced according to its location and standard. This hotel is located at Laleli,Istanbul,not a good place to stay at,i would recommend places like Sultan Ahmed or Taqsim. The room i stayed at had a borken AC which was leaking day and night,causing the carpets to be soaked with water causing a terrible smell ! In addition had a terrible noise,we reported this to the receptionist but nothing was done,only one man came and laid towels underneath it !! The bathroom is terrible,very small,broken handles,broken shower,water is not clean. Electricity broke two times in 4 days which came as a surpise to me,they dont have backup generators for the AC or anything,only the lights. The only good thing about this hotel is the receptionist we met on our 2nd and 3rd day,Zuhal and Murad,were helpful when we asked them for anything and always provided us with updates. So to sum up,you will not be happy with your stay at this hotel,the only case i would recommend this if you're on a very tight budget,otherwise try to avoid this hotel and all the hotels at Laleli for that matter,i scanned the area and all the hotels at Laleli are of the same standard. Apart from this,Istanbul and Turkey is a great place and i would definately come back again soon.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome and comfortable stay.”
Reviews.Author: Reham1913
Reviews.Content: The hotel was cozy and close to everything. We really enjoyed the staff. The manager was really helpful and attentive. I would recommend the Q Inn to anyone looking for a place to stay in the central city location. However the room was a bit small but if you're not planning on staying at the hotel for long, it shouldn't be a problem.

Reviews.Title: “We loved the receptionist!!!”
Reviews.Author: claduee
Reviews.Content: Hallo, I am Cladue Crouppe and I stayed in The Q-Inn Hotel between dates 01/06 and 05/06 with my husband. We had great time in Istanbul. It is really amazing city for us. It was our first time in Istanbul and we loved it. Lets talk about the hotel. It was a gorgeous experience to stay in this hotel. The rooms, the staff, cleanliness, service, everything was great. I would recommend this hotel to everyone honestly. I would like confirm that, we met Zuhal who is working as a receptionist. We loved her. She helped us a lot. She is really hard-working, helpfull staff. And the main thing is she is so so cheerful. We believe that she is going to have a really good career in tourism field. We hope to see her again. Thank you for everything Zuhal! Faithfully, Cladue Crouppe

Reviews.Title: “NO WAY!!! This hotel is overpriced!!!”
Reviews.Author: CINDORELLA2011
Reviews.Content: We stay 3 days in Qhotel in Laleli but we didnt enjoy it. The room was small and dirty. The bathroom was smelling very bad. Moreover, the charged us 14 TL for a double turkish coffee. Its a shame! Although we asked twice for receipt or invoice they didnt give us! For sure i will NOT reccomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: markMeyer_11
Reviews.Content: Its a nice hotel all in all. We had a great time in Istanbul and the hotel gave us the chance to take a breath every time and then. Its very comfortable and tidy. Thanks to Zuhal our personal favourite person at the hotel. She works there and was very helpful and kind and cute with us. She helped us a lot. When you go to Istanbul, and you should. Then you should stay at the Q-Inn Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful trip”
Reviews.Author: Francois02
Reviews.Content: It was my first time in this hotel and I was very much appreciated and to offer all tourist who visit Istanbul. Nice atmosphere, good clean and comfortable room. Nice design, excellent breakfast. Very good sounds' isolation - was absolutely quiet though the guests were in abundance. The location was quite good; the waiter staffs in the restaurant were very friendly and helpful;) very nice and friendly staff!

Reviews.Title: “Great Holiday”
Reviews.Author: Elkhan_1984
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Q-Inn Hotel 4 days. This hotel is in very good location, I reccommend everyone especially who likes to visit historical places.The staff was very professional and courteous.The person from reception, Mr.Rasim was very helpful, he show us which places need to go, what kind of restourants need to go, what to eat.in one word, he guide us as profesional tourist guide.If I will come again to Istanbul, I can tell for sure that I will stay in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Totally perfect”
Reviews.Author: AAAAA77
Reviews.Content: I am very thankful to all your personal for their kindness and service... Special thanks to Mr. Rasim.. Hope to see you soon

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfull stay”
Reviews.Author: microlab
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay in Q-Inn Hotel. Wonderfull atmosphere and best service. Thanks a lot to Janser for understanding and assisting very kind and professional person

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: TITOsudbury
Reviews.Content: Having been in another Hotel for two nights and been unable to take any more we decided to move to the Q INN riund the corner. We have found the Receptionist SEDA very helpful and knowledgable. The hotel was very nice and very clean. The only let down was beakfast time when it always was shortage for something the crockery wasn't very clean most of the times. I would suggest to the breakfast waiter to spend more time in the dinning room looking at ll these thing. We also found a very helpful waiter Mr Ibrahim. Very god hotel in overal and most of the staff extremely helpful. THANK YOU. We arrange our own transfer with ahmetmeydan@istanbulairport-transfer.com very good I do recommend him.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good staff”
Reviews.Author: yamtar1981
Reviews.Content: Thats very good small butic hotel.In historical part of Istanbul.Veru good staff. Alla people ara kind.Tanks a lot to MR Babayev specially for good advices!!! And very taste meals in breakfast.Rooms very silent.Impossible to ehar voice from the streets, and neighbour rooms.

Reviews.Title: “excelent”
Reviews.Author: bulgariantourist
Reviews.Content: Hello friends! I stayed in this hotel 4 days and I would stay again with pleasure! All workers are so friendly specially Mr. Rasim has mets me so good, thanks him for everything. The services, rooms, restaurant are so excelent. Thanks for all!!

Reviews.Title: “Choose this Hotel, if you want to realize your dreams...”
Reviews.Author: Tottie99
Reviews.Content: We stayed in The Q-Inn Hotel 3 days. I can tell for sure that these were my best days in Istanbul. Of course the main reason of this is The Q-Inn Hotel. Beautiful location for shopping and visiting the city, superior views, especially the Marmara sea view over the terrace restaurant..... Above all, I can not finalize my comment without emphasize one person`s name, receptionist Mr. Babayev. During our stay he was very helpful, and guide us in all things. Thank you very much for everything what you done for us.

Reviews.Title: “My adress in Istanbul-The Q-Inn Hotel”
Reviews.Author: TeymurKarimov
Reviews.Content: Because of my work every month travelling to Istanbul and staying in different hotels. But after my trip in march i found the hotel which i was looking for a long time. The Q-Inn Hotel. I dont want to describe the comfort and other privileges of this hotel. For people who is looking for the hotel to stay in Istanbul i can describe like this: If you want to stay in hotel and feel yourself "white man" choose The Q-Inn Hotel and i guarantee that you will feel yourself exactly "white man". P.S. Special thanks to Mr. Babayev for his efforts. Keep it up.

Reviews.Title: “soo exclent”
Reviews.Author: Saxa1984
Reviews.Content: hi. I can say only 1 words, this hotel very beauty. servis, rooms all exclent. and I want o say big thanks to person Rasim, who meet me and serviced me. Thanks all persons who work in this hotel. This is a exclent hotel in Isanbul.

Reviews.Title: “This is the place to stay if you're in Istanbul...”
Reviews.Author: Ashton83
Reviews.Content: I went to Turkey to visit my classmates from college. I stayed here because my friends told me it had a great view and location. So true. And the staff was very professional and courteous. I reached there 2 hours before check in time and the guy at the reception(I think his name was Rasim) didn't create problem about that at all. He even escorted me to my room and gave me suggestions about the places to visit when you are in Istanbul. Definitely made my vacation more pleasant. So as I started, if you're in Istanbul, The Q Inn is the place to stay...

Reviews.Title: “super hotel”
Reviews.Author: melankoli
Reviews.Content: I stayed for three nights. The hotel is modern. Although the hotel staff tries to appear attentive, every phone call we made to reception was answered by receptionists especially by Mr. Rasim. His hospitality surprised me

Reviews.Title: “Everything is super”
Reviews.Author: senpay
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel,nice staff,comfortable rooms. Service is very good.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bibinoz
Reviews.Content: Indeed the best hotel i've ever been. Beautiful clean rooms. i endlessly enjoyed staying at The Q-Inn hotel. The best service especially the Receptionist Janser was very grateful, hospitable. i recommend you guys to stop at The Q-Inn Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “super visit”
Reviews.Author: nergiz_999
Reviews.Content: We stayed for four nights. The hotel is clean and modern. Although the hotel staff tries to appear attentive, every phone call we made to reception was answered by receptionists especially by Mr. Rasim. His hospitality surprised me and my family. This is a good 4 star hotel I think.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money and very good personnel”
Reviews.Author: Ruslanfm
Reviews.Content: I've already been at hotel Q-Inn and i choosed it againg for the good price and quality. The hotel is in the perfect position for shopping and visiting the city! I especially thanks the receptionist Rasim for his hospitality, friendship and being helpful during our stay in hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good, sweet hotel”
Reviews.Author: Habib12
Reviews.Content: Hotel is not very big. But Crew is very picky. From rooms to service all are in good condition. Receptionist Rasim gave us very good number i the evening. and we had a good communication with him. If we summarize everything in this hotel is good.

Reviews.Title: “Unforgetable days in Q-INN”
Reviews.Author: trst2
Reviews.Content: Otel crew met us in the evening and showed the best room as possible. we stayed there about 5 days. Everything was very good. Specially reception guy Rassim helped us and advised some city places.

Reviews.Title: “Unique service from q inn hotel”
Reviews.Author: mahmoud80
Reviews.Content: This is a highly recomended hotel i stayed in this hotel for 5 days\ 4 nights. The hotel location is perfect as it is in the main shopping road and it takes you around 10 minutes walking till you reach the grand bazar, 5 minutes till you reach to the metro station. The breakfast is good and the service that ALI ERDEM provided me was unique & perfect as he changed our room to a big one and tried to hire us a cheap taxi to the airport and showed us the way to each destination we wanted to go. ALI ERDEM thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: “Fawlty Towers”
Reviews.Author: Scottys190727
Reviews.Content: A shambles from start to finish. I discovered my booking had been lost when I contacted the hotel about an airport transfer and it took a further four days to receive confirmation that my reservation had been made. Check-in took ages and despite advertising the restaurant on their website, it was only open for breakfast so there were no facilities for evening meals. Trying to get a drink from the bar was a joke as the bar staff didn't speak turkish or english and although there was an extensive coffee menu, only coffee with or without milk was available! However, the breakfast was good and the rooms weren't bad but were on the small side. The day receptionist tried his best and was helpful but the hotel seemed to be understaffed. Be aware that there are steps from street level to reception on the first floor.

Reviews.Title: “small cozy hotel for short stays”
Reviews.Author: vwest11
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel because of the positive reviews via booking.com. I emailed them right away to order a transfer service, however I did not receive any response, so we had to pick up taxi in the airport when we arrived. Location seems pretty nice, it is located in the street in the old town pretty close to restaurants, shopping area etc. We were accommodated right away, however the room which claimed to be double was really tiny. The TV didn't work and neither did the Internet. So the staff member came to our room, tried to fix it all, but after that they gave us another room with working TV and Internet (which was apparently bigger than double - i'd say it was triple). That was a nice bonus. Breakfast was alright, nothing special, but the view from the restaurant is really amazing. We needed a taxi to go to another part of the city which was like 30 minutes drive, the hotel staff offered us a car at around 75USD that was a way overpriced (we got a cab by ourselves and it cost us 30 USD). Anyway, I would recommend this hotel to short stays on business.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service. Very clean.”
Reviews.Author: Firefool
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel particularly for the positive comments on Trip Advisor about how helpful the staff were and we were not dissappointed. We booked by email and arranged for their free airport pick up which was a godsend (and they spelt my name correctly on the card - which most people don't seem to be able to manage in the UK!), particularly as our flights were delayed and we were 2 hours later than planned. Staff were very helpful at sorting us out a nice (tho' not cheap) place to eat on the first evening. Comfortable triple room. Reasonable size for this part of the city and very clean. The shower (once they remembered to turn the hot water on!) was excellent. Not very wheelchair/pushchair/heavy suitcase friendly as there are some quite steep steps to get to the door before you reach the hotel lifts, although the staff did dash down to give us a hand with our cases. Decent breakfast with plenty of choice in the top floor restaurant. Fairly scruffy location (though safe and quiet ; apart from the guy with the 03.15 Ramazan drum, but well placed for walking to the main sights such as Aya sofia and the Blue Mosque. If you want good shops you are better off going over to the more modern part of Istanbul. Air conditioning a must for Istanbul in August. Easy access to the tram also. special thanks to Erdem who made sure that we caught the right ferry to The Princes' Islands.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, pragmatic, superb service and prime location”
Reviews.Author: hajjagana
Reviews.Content: Introduced by a colleague to stayed with me at the hotel. Would recommend to any visitor to Istanbul because of their excellent service by very energetic and willing staff. More importantly, a clean environment in a prime location

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: Christina029
Reviews.Content: Although many people were puzzled by two single girls choice of staying at the once "unfriendly" district of Laleli we were quite amazed by the convenience of the district and the excellent tips given by the staff. Rooms were very clean, the service was excellent (at any time) and the hotel manager Umit was always there to help us with everything we needed. The hotel offers a very decent breakfast with a view of the Bosporus, its really close to the tram station and prices are very competitive considering that for the same hotel in another district you would propably spend much more. Would definately recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location; good views”
Reviews.Author: SveaSvea
Reviews.Content: I was a late arrival - all staff were very helpful but I suggest you get info during the working day if need to speak with someone in fluent English. Arrangements were made on my behalf to do an afternoon cruise - despite this needing to be done between midnight and 8am. Use the good location of this hotel by setting off on foot - easy walking distance to Grand Bazaar and other sites. Great places to eat nearby. Breakfast was a great start - expansive view, peaceful, good spread, attentive service. My room was small and next door neighbour kept TV going all night which was not great, but no noise from roads etc. Highly recommended if you have a short amount of time to spend and want to get a feel for this city and its people. Transport to and from airport was reliable and reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel”
Reviews.Author: abdullabishit
Reviews.Content: very quite and great staff..in the center of the city of Istanbul, the staff are very understanding and helpful, funny as well!, great cleanliness.

Reviews.Title: “disappointing”
Reviews.Author: aussie95
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this hotel. On the website the rooms look really nice but they are actually tiny and the walls are very thin. The decor of the rooms are tacky and very cheap looking for the price you pay. The service is great but does not make up for everything else which is not up to standard. My partner and I were very disappointed! There are plenty of other places to stay in Istanbul which are nice and a better price.

Reviews.Title: “It was the most perfect experience”
Reviews.Author: aakkad
Reviews.Content: The service and staff in the Hotel was just incredible. We have never experienced nicer customer care and service then in the Q Inn Hotel in Istanbul. The staff was very helpful and answered all our needs.The view of the Terrace Restaurant, were breakfast was served was so beautiful and peaceful - enjoying a great breakfast with the view of the Marmara Sea. The location could not have been any better, everything was easy accessable and walk distance, such as Sultanahmet and Blue Mosque, Grand Bazar, Hagia Sophia etc. I would always recommend this Hotel. The Rooms are very clean and very cozy and comfortable. My next trip to Istanbul will be soon and definitely we will be stayin in Q-Inn Hotel again.

HotelInfo.Name: The Q-Inn Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Koska Cad. No: 30 | Laleli, Istanbul, Turkey
